SUBJ: PAHO-BOLIVIAN POSITION ON ELECTION OF DIRECTOR


REF: STATE 144367


MOISES FUENTES, DIRECTOR GENERAL OF INTERNATIONAL ORGANZIATIONS OF
THE MINISTRY OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS AND WORSHIP, REPORTS THAT BOLIVIA
HAS ALREADY COMMITTED ITESELF TO VOTE FOR CHILE'S HORWITZ FOR
THE POST OF DIRECTOR OF PAHO. FUENTES ADDED THAT, IN VIEW OF
STRONG PRESSURE FROM MEXICO, THE GOB HAS INDICATED THAT IT WOULD
VOTE FOR ACUNA MONTEVERDE IF IT IS APPARENT FROM FIRST ROUND OF
VOTING THAT HORWITZ HAS NO CHANCE.
STEDMAN








NNN
